messages.simpleveinminer.restriction.too: You need a tool to veinmine
messages.simpleveinminer.restriction.spe: This is not the right tool for this block
messages.simpleveinminer.restriction.hun: You are too hungry to veinmine
config.simpleveinminer.toggleState.descr: This has no effect if the keybind mode is set to Hold
config.simpleveinminer.showMiningProgres: Show mining progress on the blocks being veinmined
The maximum number of blocks that can be mined at once
config.simpleveinminer.limits.materialBa:
The weaker the tool used to veinmine,
the less blocks can be veinmined at once
config.simpleveinminer.durability.damage: How much damage a tool takes per block veinmined
config.simpleveinminer.durability.swordM: If the tool is a sword, how much does that damage get multiplied by
config.simpleveinminer.durability.consum: Lose durability on blocks with 0 hardness
config.simpleveinminer.restrictions.canV: Can veinmine without a tool (or sword)
config.simpleveinminer.restrictions.crea: Ignore restrictions when on creative mode
config.simpleveinminer.restrictions.canO: Can only veinmine with the right tool

Will only allow to veinmine wood using an axe,
dirt using a shovel, stone using a pickaxe, etc.
config.simpleveinminer.keybindToggles.de:
Recommended: If you turn this on,
turn restriction messages off and highlights on
config.simpleveinminer.highlight.doHighl: Highlight blocks that wil be mined
gamerule.doServerSideVeinmining: VeinMining should be handled server side
